nodes.text: Alaris Prime was one of the several moons that orbited the planet Alaris of the Kashyyyk system in the Mytaranor sector. It was the homeworld of the wasp-like gnasps, and by the time of the Clone Wars, it became home to a colony of adventurous Wookiees from the neighboring world of Kashyyyk. At one point, it also housed a treasure vault of the Jedi Order, which ended up being raided by an audacious Defel thief named Zaril.
